content: Hi, i am trying to map FHIR Bundle to hl7 document in order to send the HL7 to some laboratories. Right now i am building the MSH Segment and i do not find in what portion of the FHIR Resources come Sending Facility (MSH-4) Information. Any help is welcome.
@Johann Pino Vázquez see sender and source in http://build.fhir.org/messageheader.html
and if you don't have a message header, you're creating the message, and make up your own values for the message
